patthana1.20:1.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:1.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:2.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— anāgatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:3.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paccuppannārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:3.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:4.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.20:4.1_11: vipākapaccayā (vipākaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ, tissopi pañhā paripuṇṇā.
patthana1.20:5.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
patthana1.20:7.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:7.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.20:8.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:8.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.20:9.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:9.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.20:10.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana1.20:11.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā— arūpe atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe…
patthana1.20:12.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe anāgatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:13.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe…
patthana1.20:14.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā …
patthana1.20:15.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—anāgatārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca anāgatārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.20:16.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—paccuppannārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.20:17.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā …pe….
patthana1.20:18.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:19.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā— ahetukaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.20:20.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:21.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe anāgatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:22.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge tīṇi, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.20:24.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.20:26.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… (sabbattha tīṇi) avigate tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.20:29.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— atītārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:29.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe atītārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:30.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— anāgatārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:31.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—paccuppannārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:31.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:32.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— atītaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.20:32.1_4: Ariyā atītārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.20:32.1_5: Atītārammaṇe atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:32.1_6: taṁ ārabbha atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana1.20:32.1_10: Atītārammaṇā atītā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:33.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— anāgataṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.20:33.1_8: Atītārammaṇā anāgatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:34.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— cetopariyañāṇena atītārammaṇapaccuppannacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti.
patthana1.20:34.1_1: Atītārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:35.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— anāgatārammaṇaṁ anāgataṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.20:35.1_6: Anāgatārammaṇā anāgatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:36.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— anāgatārammaṇaṁ atītaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ …
patthana1.20:36.1_2: ariyā anāgatārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.20:36.1_8: Anāgatārammaṇā atītā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:37.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cetopariyañāṇena anāgatārammaṇapaccuppannacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti.
patthana1.20:37.1_1: Anāgatārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:38.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cetopariyañāṇena paccuppannārammaṇapaccuppannacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti.
patthana1.20:38.1_1: Paccuppannārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:39.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— atītaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ atītaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.20:39.1_1: Ariyā paccuppannārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.20:39.1_6: Paccuppannārammaṇā atītā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:40.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anāgataṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ anāgataṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.20:40.1_5: Paccuppannārammaṇā anāgatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:41.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.20:41.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—atītaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.20:41.1_2: Atītārammaṇaṁ atītaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.20:41.1_5: Atītārammaṇe atīte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:42.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:42.1_7: atītārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:42.1_8: taṁ garuṁ katvā anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:43.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.20:43.1_4: Anāgatārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:43.1_5: taṁ garuṁ katvā anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:44.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:44.1_4: anāgatārammaṇe atīte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:44.1_5: taṁ garuṁ katvā atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:45.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:46.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:46.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—atītaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ atītaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.20:46.1_3: paccuppannārammaṇe atīte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:46.1_4: taṁ garuṁ katvā atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:47.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:47.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—anāgataṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.20:47.1_4: paccuppannārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:47.1_5: taṁ garuṁ katvā anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:48.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā atītārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ atītārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:49.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— atītārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ anāgatārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:50.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— atītārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ paccuppannārammaṇassa paṭisandhicittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:50.1_1: Atītārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ paccuppannārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:51.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā anāgatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ anāgatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:52.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— anāgatārammaṇaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ atītārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa …pe…
patthana1.20:52.1_3: anāgatārammaṇā khandhā atītārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:53.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā paccuppannārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:53.1_2: paccuppannārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ paccuppannārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:54.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannārammaṇaṁ paṭisandhicittaṁ atītārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassa …pe…
patthana1.20:54.1_2: paccuppannārammaṇā khandhā atītārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:55.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.20:56.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:57.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:57.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—atītārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā atītārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:58.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:58.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—atītārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā anāgatārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:59.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:59.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—atītārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā paccuppannārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:60.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:60.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—anāgatārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā anāgatārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:61.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:61.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—anāgatārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā atītārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:62.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:62.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—anāgatārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā paccuppannārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:63.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:63.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paccuppannārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā paccuppannārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:64.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:64.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paccuppannārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā atītārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:65.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.20:65.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paccuppannārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā anāgatārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:66.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ atītārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:67.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā anāgatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ anāgatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:68.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā paccuppannārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:69.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.20:69.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—atītārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ atītārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:70.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:70.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—atītārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ anāgatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:71.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:71.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—atītārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ paccuppannārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:72.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.20:72.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—anāgatārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ anāgatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:73.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:73.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—anāgatārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ atītārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:74.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:74.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—anāgatārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ paccuppannārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:75.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.20:75.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ paccuppannārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:76.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:76.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ atītārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:77.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:77.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ anāgatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:78.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:79.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.20:81.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:82.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:83.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:84.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:85.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:86.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:87.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:88.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:89.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.20:90.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha nava), novigate nava, noavigate nava.
patthana1.20:92.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi, saṅkhittaṁ), nonatthiyā novigate tīṇi.
patthana1.20:94.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate tīṇi.
